decision_conditions: The proposed work is to be carried out to British Standard 3998 (2010) Tree Work Recommendations, by a reputable tree surgeon to the satisfaction of the Tree Preservation Officer who should be informed of the date of commencement of work.
description:
T1. London Plane	
Rear Garden of 2 Southmead Gardens:
A mature tree which has been managed by pruning back to previous points on a cycle of every 4/5 years.
Large stem cavity present at 11m.
Recommended work to manage crown volume.
Reduce new growth to previous reduction points 3m off the height and lateral spread of new growth only, retaining good growth points for crown development.
Thin regrowth on the east flank of the crown by 20%.
Remove dead branches.

The tree's current height is 26m, and its crown spread is 17m.
After the proposed works, the tree's height is 23m and the crown spread is 14m.
